name: Puzzle - Collect the image
description:
I present to you the second version of my game Puzzle - Collect the picture. It's much easier.

The goal of the game is to collect the picture, as in the thumbnail shown above. 

To move a fragment of the picture, click on it with the mouse pointer. Make the second click on the fragment where you want to move the first fragment. The fragments will be swapped. On touch screens, tap on tiles with your finger.
